segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed he hasn’t fallen off that stool yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right in front of their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s too busy drying dishes to notice anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a slow-motion disaster unfolding in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most chaotic scenes I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
